thread.title: Flip or Flop’s Christina El Moussa Splits From Family Contractor Gary Anderson
thread.title_full: Flip or Flop’s Christina El Moussa Splits From Family Contractor Gary Anderson

title: Flip or Flop’s Christina El Moussa Splits From Family Contractor Gary Anderson
text:
Josh Murray on Bachelor Nick: I Don't Think 'His Intentions Are True' 
An insider told Us Weekly that the couple, who started dating in mid-2016 , “broke up because of too many outside pressures.” The duo were photographed together for the first time earlier this month, taking a stroll in Yorba Linda, California. Prior to their relationship, Anderson worked on projects for the HGTV star, 33, but things turned romantic after her split from husband Tarek El Moussa last year. Celebrity Friendly Exes: Hollywood's Ex-Lovers Who Have Stayed Close 
The Flip or Flop costars have been in the spotlight in recent months due to their messy separation. As was previously reported, Tarek, 35, filed for divorce from Christina on January 9 after seven years of marriage. They announced back in December that they were calling it quits after news broke of a May gun incident , in which police were called to their Orange County, California, home. Tarek and Christina El Moussa, hosts of HGTV's hit show 'Flip or Flop,' visited the HGTV Santa HQ in 2014. Jerod Harris/Getty Images 
Tarek opened up in the latest issue of Us Weekly about working with his ex on their hit TV show and coparenting their daughter Taylor, 6, and son Brayden, 18 months. “It’s like anything. You have good days and bad days,” he said. “It was a stressful time, but we had to do our job. Our job is to film a show and flip houses. But our most important job is to co-parent.” Hollywood's Ugliest Divorces 
The dad of two, who previously battled thyroid cancer, also revealed in the exclusive interview that he suffered from testicular cancer too. “I had thyroid cancer in 2013. One month later they found out I had testicular cancer. It was very difficult on me,” he said. “My hormones were way off. It affected me. It’s been three years of hell. I was devastated when I found out. So was Christina.” 
Pick up the new issue of Us Weekly on stands now to see what Tarek had to say about the May altercation and much more.
